name: Dada Boudi
location: 12/1 Barrackpore S.N. Banerjee Road, Opposite Sukanto Sadan
about: Welcome to Dada Boudi Restaurant, your go-to for authentic Mughlai flavors in Barrackpore, Kolkata! Indulge in our aromatic biryani and mouthwatering kebabs that have become local favorites. Located just across from Sukanto Sadan, our family-friendly spot offers delightful dining experiences. Book a table today at Dada Boudi, where tradition meets taste!

starterMenu.name: Assorted Kebabs
starterMenu.description: A selection of succulent tandoori chicken, mutton tikka, and fish tikka, marinated in aromatic spices and grilled to perfection.

starterMenu.name: Crispy Chilli Chicken
starterMenu.description: A spicy and flavorful dish of chicken pieces coated in a crispy batter and tossed in a tangy chili sauce.

starterMenu.name: Mutton Seekh Kebab
starterMenu.description: Minced mutton delicately spiced and skewered, cooked to a juicy and tender perfection in a tandoor oven.

mainMenu.name: Mutton Biryani
mainMenu.description: A fragrant rice dish layered with tender mutton pieces, cooked to perfection with aromatic spices and caramelized onions.

mainMenu.name: Butter Chicken
mainMenu.description: Tender chicken pieces simmered in a rich and buttery tomato-based gravy, infused with aromatic spices.

mainMenu.name: Dal Makhani
mainMenu.description: Creamy and buttery black lentils cooked with kidney beans, tempered with ginger, garlic, and aromatic spices.

mainMenu.name: Sahi Paneer
mainMenu.description: Cottage cheese cubes stuffed with paneer and nuts, deep-fried until golden brown, and served in a rich and creamy cashew-based gravy.

drinks.name: Aam Panna
drinks.description: A refreshing drink made with raw mango pulp, sweetened with jaggery and seasoned with cumin powder.

drinks.name: Lassi
drinks.description: A traditional yogurt-based drink blended with water, spices, and sometimes fruits.

drinks.name: Masala Chai
drinks.description: A fragrant and spiced tea made with black tea, milk, ginger, cardamom, and cloves.

drinks.name: Lemon Soda
drinks.description: A refreshing and fizzy drink made with fresh lemon juice, soda water, and sugar.

drinks.name: Rooh Afza
drinks.description: A popular Pakistani drink made with rose syrup, water, and milk.

drinks.name: Shikanji
drinks.description: A refreshing Indian drink made with lemon juice, water, sugar, and black salt.

drinks.name: Fresh Lime Soda
drinks.description: A classic and zesty drink made with fresh lime juice, soda water, and sugar.

drinks.name: Mango Shake
drinks.description: A creamy and flavorful milkshake made with fresh mangoes, milk, and sugar.

drinks.name: Rose Milk
drinks.description: A refreshing and delicate drink made with rose syrup, milk, and sometimes ice.

special.name: Chef's Special Tandoori Platter
special.description: A generous platter of assorted tandoori delights, including tandoori chicken, tandoori prawns, tandoori vegetables, and tandoori naan.

special.name: Hyderabadi Biryani
special.description: A flavorful and aromatic biryani dish from Hyderabad, featuring tender mutton, caramelized onions, and fragrant spices.

special.name: Angoori Gulab Jamun
special.description: Melt-in-your-mouth gulab jamun dumplings made with milk solids and soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup.

dessert.name: Gulab Jamun
dessert.description: Soft and spongy milk-based dumplings soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup.

dessert.name: Rasgulla
dessert.description: Soft and delicate cheese dumplings soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup.

dessert.name: Jalebi
dessert.description: Crispy and spiral-shaped deep-fried batter soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup.

dessert.name: Kheer
dessert.description: Rice pudding made with milk, rice, sugar, and a variety of nuts, cooked to a creamy and comforting perfection.
